channel.title: Laser room door not opening
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm in the laser room just after th accident, which is just after you see your first baddies. My issue is that at the end of the corridor, I cannot seem to open a door. I think it may be where the crowbar is SUPPOSED to show up, but if so, it's not there. I've uploaded a picture of the door to:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96199776[/url]
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Laser room door not opening
item.dc:creator: M8R-3e4p0o
item.description:
doesn’t open you have to crouch and go threw broken glass
